content.raw:
I think It is better to change Elbow -> Arm to be more consistent to the description given in this [link](http://simspark.sourceforge.net/wiki/index.php/Models#Physical_Properties).
I know in the current model the better name is Elbow, but I think in the RoboCup model, the arm's yaw joint is actually attached to the shoulder. After changing these names, we can also change them in the sdf file.
content.html: I think It is better to change Elbow -> Arm to be more consistent to the description given in this link. I know in the current model the better name is Elbow, but I think in the RoboCup model, the arm's yaw joint is actually attached to the shoulder. After changing these names, we can also change them in the sdf file.
